title: Living wills and advance directives
dataVerified: Patient name, DOB, medical wishes, appointed decision-maker, witnesses
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Critical end-of-life decisions. Prevents forged advance directives. Domain binding verifies issuing authority (notary, healthcare system). Human-readable wishes essential. Permanent legal records. Multi-page: Full living wills may be multi-page - per-page verification prevents tampering.
